column2: Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Objective One, Colmont, is clear. Over.
Papa Bear, Papa Bear, do you read? This is Alpha. We have secured Objective Two. One fallen Ranger body recovered. Over.
Alpha to HQ. Third objective, der Kessel, aka Cauldron, is ours, although not without a fight. Over.
Alpha Black calling Papa. We've just cleared the fourth objective. Moorsel is FRG territory again. Livestock seized. Over.
Roger that, Alpha. Colmont is ours. Carry on. Papa Bear out.
Papa Bear to Alpha One. Understood. Fortmond, that's important. Good work. We'll notify next-of-kin. HQ out.
Alpha, this is Papa, we read you. Looks like you fired up that cauldron pretty good. Out.
Papa Bear to Alpha. Acknowledged, good job. Out.
Welcome back, Alpha. Your mission is complete. Thanks for the cav support, it really helped. Papa Bear signing off.
